change the 7 and 5 on addSkillXP((7*playerLevel[4]), 4); addSkillXP((5*playerLevel[18]), 18); to how ever much xp u want it to give and save and compile

item.title: Simple question (im nooby lol)
item.dc:creator: @The_Almost The Almost
item.description:
@The_Almost wrote:

ok im changing xp rate for when you shoot at a target to train range i need to know what to change of the following code so it will be faster.

case 2514: if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You shoot at the target."); actionName = "range1"; actionTimer = 30; setAnimation(426); addSkillXP((7*playerLevel[4]), 4); addSkillXP((5*playerLevel[18]), 18); addItem(3272, 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;
can anyone please help?
